entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
